node.name: Pax Runner Plugin For Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse is an Eclipse Plugin that adds Eclipse launch configurations for all OSGi frameworks / versions supported by Pax Runner.
By using Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse you will be able to install and start your bundles into any of Felix, Equinox, Knopflerfish or Concierge beside the built in Equinox. (even more you will be able to start more versions of Equinox). And you will do all of this without learning anything new beside what you already know as Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse transparently integrates into the OSGi Framework Launcher using the OSGi Frameworks extension point.

Read more about Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse
node.body:
Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse is an Eclipse Plugin that adds Eclipse launch configurations for all OSGi frameworks / versions supported by Pax Runner.
By using Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse you will be able to install and start your bundles into any of Felix, Equinox, Knopflerfish or Concierge beside the built in Equinox. (even more you will be able to start more versions of Equinox). And you will do all of this without learning anything new beside what you already know as Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse transparently integrates into the OSGi Framework Launcher using the OSGi Frameworks extension point.

Read more about Pax Runner Plugin for Eclipse
